name: places/ChIJuRgF4IFZwokR1LCDxJx0m4o
formattedAddress: 123 Ridge St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 123 Ridge St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: This school failed my little sister, she is getting left back even after my mom constantly asked them to help her , they care more about covering for their teachers and following protocol then caring about the kids needs and making sure they succeed and learn to the best of their potential. My sister is too smart to be getting left back. she has sensory and behavior issues which make her give my mom a hard time getting to school on time, thats all. but she is smart and only needed services to help her and no one did. Shame on this school for letting their kids fall between the cracks and not caring.

originalText.text: A good school with big goals. They try to make the community a better place and teachers sacrifice their time to help others. It's always student first in this school and everyone is there to help you.

text.text: A good school with big goals. They try to make the community a better place and teachers sacrifice their time to help others. It's always student first in this school and everyone is there to help you.

originalText.text: this school is the best place i have went to the staff are great i have grown great relationship with all staff because not only did i see that the staff care for the kids they care for the parents too. Some of you guys can say this school is bad but not me this is school is the best and i cant wait to see great things from the staff and kids and even parents as this school grows

originalText.text: It is a great school where my children go to and I felt so welcomed and comfortable the moment I walked in.
